1.20.1.1.1.0: Changed: Renamed incorrectly named AbstractObsidianPacks to AbstractOblivionPacks
1.20.1.1.2.0:
Added: Additional constructor for AbstractOblivionMixinPlugin to allow adding a prefix to all mixin names
Fixed: AbstractOblivionMixinPlugin is no longer package-private
1.20.1.2.0.0:
Added: methods that put certain block/item properties back to their defaults, such as undoing noCollission()
Removed: hackyMixinUtils package (PropertyRebuilders)
